item.description: I am currently visiting the Department of Economics at Brown University during the 2022 Fall quarter. I am an Assistant Professor at the Department of Economics at PUC-Rio. My research interests lie at the intersection of Development, Politics, and Environmental Economics. I have co-founded and lead the data team at Data Basis (Base dos Dados), a nonprofit start-up with the mission to make access to high-quality data universal in Brazil. We build tools such as a search engine and a public datalake to facilitate data work for academics, journalists, policy makers, companies, and developers.
